scheduled_maintenances.name: [Global][Dedicated Cloud] - End of Life Dedicated Cloud

incident_updates.body: End of Life Dedicated Cloud: 30 September 2022 We informed you in October 2021 that our Dedicad Cloud service will reach its end of life and will be discontinued the 30st September 2022. This step is important for your VMware platforms to improve the quality of service, performance, and security of your clusters. Indeed, "Dedicated Cloud" hardware used, pre-2016, does not allow us to provide the best level of service and integration with new modern architectures of VMware. Following our previous email, many customers started to plan and/or to migrate and we encourage you to do the same to avoid the September deadline. Guide to migrating to a new infrastructure: https://docs.ovh.com/gb/en/private-cloud/vdc-migration/
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
